Dialogs.Text: Thomas B: Quite colorful drawings here, similar to my daughter's.
Thomas B: Judging by the names on the heads, seems they represent users from this place.
Thomas B: Back when this place had activity, seems that artists gath--- Wait...
Thomas B: All of them have the same signature. Also... Is this a card with a code?
Thomas B: Better write this down, it can come in handy somewhere.

Evidence.Description: A colorful card with an user name and a code.
